alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette County through 345 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Menominee, or near Marinette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Pound, Peshtigo, Porterfield, Beaver and Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized urban flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
